message.content: {"id": "4974", "title": "Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation", "description": "", "OB": "Currently, the setting of classpath and output location is done separately. To improve usability, these operations should be combined into one. This would make it more efficient for users to manage their project settings.", "EB": "Currently, users have to set the classpath and output location separately. The proposed improvement is to provide an option to set both the classpath and output location in a single operation. This would simplify the process and make it more convenient for users.", "SR": "Implement a feature that allows users to set the classpath and output location together in a single operation. Update the error message to display a more accurate error when attempting to nest a directory within itself."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
